CustomField.description:
Non rollup variant of the # of Open Committed Opportunities field (https://retool.lightning.force.com/lightning/setup/ObjectManager/Account/FieldsAndRelationships/00N5A00000IDwoe/view)
Updated via the Account - After Save Automations. Currently used as a helper field in Contact - Before Save Automations to bypass a `Get Account` step.

Non rollup variant of the # of Open Committed Opportunities field (https://retool.lightning.force.com/lightning/setup/ObjectManager/Account/FieldsAndRelationships/00N5A00000IDwoe/view)
Updated via the Account - After Save Automations. Currently used as a helper field in Contact - Before Save Automations to bypass a `Get Account` step.
CustomField.label: # Open Committed Opportunities
